title: Tile, late 18th–early 19th century
medium: Earthenware, glazed and high fired decorated
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Man in high boots, white breeches and brown jacket, wearing bicorn hat, and holding a stick in his right hand. Tree trunk with a few leaves at the left.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tile, late 18th–early 19th century.
late 18th–early 19th century. Earthenware, glazed and high fired decorated. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1920-15-13.
